about.title: About This Site
about.subtitle: A feature-rich site monitoring dashboard built with a modern tech stack.

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.desc: Fetches and displays real-time status and response latency via the UptimeRobot API.

history.title: Historical Data
history.desc: Visualizes the last 60 days of uptime and response trends with heatmaps and charts.

i18n.title: Multi-language Support
i18n.desc: Built-in support for Chinese, English, and Japanese, easily extensible.

theming.title: Light/Dark Themes
theming.desc: Supports light, dark, and system-preferred theme modes for a comfortable viewing experience.

auth.title: Password Protection
auth.desc: Site-wide password protection can be enabled via environment variables.

responsive.title: Responsive Design
responsive.desc: Optimized layout for a great browsing experience on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

items.nuxt: A powerful Vue framework offering server-side rendering and static generation.
items.vue: The progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces.
items.typescript: Adds a type system to JavaScript, enhancing code robustness and maintainability.
items.tailwind: A utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building custom user interfaces.
items.chartjs: A simple yet flexible JavaScript charting library for data visualization.
items.uptimerobot: Provides a stable and reliable API service for website uptime monitoring.

source.title: Get the Source
source.desc: This project is fully open-source. Feel free to view, use, or contribute to the code.
